document.full_text: spain vowed on thursday it would not follow ailing neighbor portugal in seeking a european bailout, and a successful spanish bond auction suggested markets do not immediately fear contagion.
document.title: spain vows won't be next after portugal seeks aid
lines_and_colors: spain vowed on thursday it would not follow ailing neighbor portugal in seeking a european bailout, and a successful spanish bond auction suggested markets do not immediately fear contagion.
